message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40.
Let's split it 55-45, Alice. I think I deserve a bit more.
Bob, time is running out and we're both losing money. I'll come down to 58, your share increases to 42.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise. 52-48 is a fair split, considering the inflation.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer and we both get something before inflation eats it all!
Alice, I think we've both suffered enough from inflation. A 50-50 split is the fairest option at this point.
